title: Water Globe - Giraffe from Deluxebase. Giraffe Snow Globe with Resin Figurine and Moulded Base. Great Home Globe Decor, Ornaments and Gifts.
features: CLASSIC AND TIMELESS: A perfect gift for people of all ages! This delicate glitter globe will fascinate kids and prompt fond memories in adults.

PREMIUM MATERIALS: A crystal clear glass globe, filled with water and glitter, surrounds a detailed figurine and rests on top of a base that has been cast in high quality resin. All of which is carefully hand painted!

DECORATIVE AND MEMORABLE: An ornament fit for any mantlepiece, shelf or coffee table. This animal water globe will be a great home decoration! There are 20 different water globes in the collection. Collect them all! There are snow globes for kids and adults!
DIMENSIONS: The glass globe is 2.5" in diameter and with the resin base the total height is 3.3". Great water globe decor and globe centerpiece.
description: The design of the painstakingly handpainted base seamlessly compliments the shape and position of the giraffe figurines encased in the globe. Carefully tip it up to see the glitter floating through the water, mimicking a hazy day on the African savannah. Great decorative globes for home decor and suitable snow globes for girls, boys, women and men! Collect the other animal themed snow globes in the Deluxebase Water Globe Great decorative globes for home decor and suitable snow globes for girls, boys, women and men! Collection. Styles include: - Butterfly - Dolphin - Elephant - Flamingo - Giraffe - Lion - Monkey - Owl - Pandas - Parrot - Penguin - Reef Fish - Ring-Tailed Lemur - Sea Turtles - Seahorses - Shark - Tiger - Wolf - Zebra.
